name: Gravity Flip (zacharydpf)
description:
Controls:

A and D to move left and right (respectively)

W to jump while on the ground

S to jump downwards while on the ceiling

Space Bar to flip gravity for the player

V to flip gravity for interactable cubes

Team:

Dante T.

Liam M.

Zachary S.

Theme: Two Sides

For this game, you must use two sides of gravity, rising and falling, to traverse the levels and solve the puzzles.

Music by HookSounds

Song: Stars In The Sky 

https://www.hooksounds.com/royalty-free-music/stars-in-the-sky/1899352/
